description: A compact two-piece chest rig with plenty of webbing to strap MOLLE pouches onto.  Can be worn over plate carriers.

name.str: Tactical Tailor MAV 2 Piece chest rig

variants.description: A compact rig with two large webbing panels, locking with buckles in the middle.  For its size, it offers plenty of space for MOLLE pouches, though not as much as full-sized load-bearing vests.  It could, however, be comfortably worn with slick plate carriers that don't offer any webbing of their own; the rig could then be swiftly doffed without removing ballistic protection.  <variant_multicam>

name.str: Tactical Tailor MAV 2 Piece chest rig

variants.description: A compact rig with two large webbing panels, locking with buckles in the middle.  For its size, it offers plenty of space for MOLLE pouches, though not as much as full-sized load-bearing vests.  It could, however, be comfortably worn with slick plate carriers that don't offer any webbing of their own; the rig could then be swiftly doffed without removing ballistic protection.  <variant_coyote>

name.str: Tactical Tailor MAV 2 Piece chest rig

variants.description: A compact rig with two large webbing panels, locking with buckles in the middle.  For its size, it offers plenty of space for MOLLE pouches, though not as much as full-sized load-bearing vests.  It could, however, be comfortably worn with slick plate carriers that don't offer any webbing of their own; the rig could then be swiftly doffed without removing ballistic protection.  <variant_olive>

//weight: manufacturer states weight of the rig itself (straps + panel) to be 8.4 oz = 238.14 g

we add 5 g × (4 + 2) = 30 g for the 4 female buckles included with the rig kit (source for weight/dimensions) and the two other QASM (female) ones on the X-harness, as visible on pictures of the rig itself, presuming that their weight is not included

notes: depth accounts for both the backing fabric and the PALS loops
trim, therefore, accounts for not the whole panel being filled with PALS loops

trim, therefore, accounts for not the whole panel being filled with PALS loops
dimensions acquired from visual reference
the buckle dimensions also account for the fabric strap holding the buckle attached to the panels

the buckle dimensions also account for the fabric strap holding the buckle attached to the panels

//dimensions: multiplied by 135% to account for the the rest of the straps that are difficult to measure
//longest_side: assumes the length of a single PALS panel (8 columns × 1.5 in. = 12 in.), folded in half: 12 / 2 = 6 in. = 152.4 mm ≈ 152 mm

notes: said to span the entire size of the panel

//max_item_length: while the pocket itself spans the entire length of the panel, the opening is roughly 3 in. shorter

notes: said to span the entire size of the panel

//max_item_length: while the pocket itself spans the entire length of the panel, the opening is roughly 3 in. shorter

//notes: this item does not allow the bib to be adjusted (tucked in or set up, the latter being the in-game configuration)
bib adjustment shouldn't matter too much anyway because the encumbrance effect would be almost non-existent by the game's current standards
it also doesn't presently allow for a ballistic plate to be inserted, partly for balance reasons (to be reviewed)
we are modelling the front pouches as if they are irremovable, which seems to be the case, with reviewers not saying a word about it
reference chart is explicit about this model having double-magazine pouches

description: A large, comfortable chest rig with plenty of PALS webbing.  It has four rifle magazine pouches, each fitting up to two STANAG magazines, as well as with two spacious side pouches and a bib that offers some extra webbing.

name.str: Tasmanian Tiger Mk II chest rig

variants.description: A large chest rig with plenty of PALS webbing.  Much of the rig is padded on the inside, making wearing it more comfortable.  The rig has four rifle magazine pouches, each fitting up to two STANAG magazines, as well as two spacious side pouches and a bib that offers some extra storage and webbing.  <variant_multicam>

name.str: Tasmanian Tiger Mk II chest rig

notes: dimensions acquired from manipulating given dimensions in source
length is half the medium internal length of straps (32 in. / 2 = 16 in.) plus 2/5 parts (16 in. × 1 2/5 = 19.2 in.)
height (depth) is width of MOLLE on side pouches (3 × 1.5 in. = 4.5 in.), plus 0.5 in.
width is 2/6 the complete interior waist length
trim is for -10% to account for dimensions used being interior ones, and 75% for the actual space taken

description: A slick chest rig with a lot of capacity of MOLLE capacity.  It features six pockets for STANAG magazines, an admin pouch, and a pouch for a hydration bladder.

variants.description: A slick and comfortable chest rig with a large amount of space for stuff, both in PALS webbing and in embedded pockets.  It features six pockets for STANAG magazines, a tall admin pouch hidden inside the bib, and a pouch for a 3L hydration bladder on the back.  Additionally, there are two large MOLLE areas on the front, a small space on the bib, a tall one on the back, and a very-small one on each shoulder strap.  <variant_multicam>

A slick and comfortable chest rig with a large amount of space for stuff, both in PALS webbing and in embedded pockets. description: A thin nylon mesh vest with lots of webbing to strap MOLLE pouches to.  This model was issued to the U.S. army prior to the end of the world.

variants.description: Fighting Load Carrier vest, part of the MOLLE II modular system of soldier equipment.  Designed to be worn outside the armor, it can be equipped with multiple MOLLE pouches and disposed of quickly, without also doffing ballistic armor.  <variant_acu>.

Fighting Load Carrier vest, part of the MOLLE II modular system of soldier equipment.  Designed to be worn outside the armor, it can be equipped with multiple MOLLE pouches and disposed of quickly, without also doffing ballistic armor.  <variant_woodland>

description: A compact chest rig: a small MOLLE panel held by nylon straps.  Comfortable to wear compared to other chest rigs, but offers minimal space for MOLLE pouches.

name.str: Haley Strategic MOLLE placard chest rig

variants.description: A compact and minimal chest rig: a detachable MOLLE placard held by sturdy nylon straps.  The trade-off for comfort of use is minimal space for pouches.  The spacer-mesh pad on the back of the rig makes wearing it more comfortable; the pad attaches to a hook-and-loop panel, and between the two, hanger pouches could be fitted for additional functionality.  <variant_multicam>

description: A minimal-yet-capable chest rig.  It features four rifle magazine pockets, four pistol magazine pockets, and a general pouch.

variants.description: A compact, preset chest rig featuring four rifle magazine pouches and four pistol magazine pouches.  The rifle mag pouches can take STANAG and AK magazines, while the pistol mag pouches would likely only take standard-capacity magazines.  Also features a general pouch for storing minimal combat necessities, like your smartphone, credit cards, maps, small notebooks, and so on.  The general pouch has a 4×2 PALS webbing grid for attaching additional MOLLE pouches.  <variant_multicam>

A compact, preset chest rig featuring four rifle magazine pouches and four pistol magazine pouches.  The rifle mag pouches can take STANAG and AK magazines, while the pistol mag pouches would likely only take standard-capacity magazines.  Also features a general pouch for storing minimal combat necessities, like your smartphone, credit cards, maps, small notebooks, and so on.  The general pouch has a 4×2 PALS webbing grid for attaching additional MOLLE pouches.  <variant_multicam_black>

description: A nylon vest with a lot of pockets.  It has three rifle magazile pouches, three pistol magazine pouches, a small general pouch, and a pistol holster, which has a magazine pouch of its own.

variants.description: A sturdy tactical vest, mostly mesh in the back and mostly solid nylon in the front.  It features three pockets for a rifle magazine, three pockets for a pistol magazine (or a tool of similar size), and an extra small pocket on the chest.  It comes with a pistol holster in the cross draw position: at an angle, on the side opposite the dominant hand, to be drawn with it; the holster has a separate pocket for a magazine.  Hook-and-loop shoulder pads combined with generous side strap belts allow for a large degree of adjustment, making the vest fit for any size.  <variant_black>

A sturdy tactical vest, mostly mesh in the back and mostly solid nylon in the front.  It features three pockets for a rifle magazine, three pockets for a pistol magazine (or a tool of similar size), and an extra small pocket on the chest.  It comes with a pistol holster in the cross draw position: at an angle, on the side opposite the dominant hand, to be drawn with it; the holster has a separate pocket for a magazine.  Hook-and-loop shoulder pads combined with generous side strap belts allow for a large degree of adjustment, making the vest fit for any size.  <variant_coyote>

A sturdy tactical vest, mostly mesh in the back and mostly solid nylon in the front.  It features three pockets for a rifle magazine, three pockets for a pistol magazine (or a tool of similar size), and an extra small pocket on the chest.  It comes with a pistol holster in the cross draw position: at an angle, on the side opposite the dominant hand, to be drawn with it; the holster has a separate pocket for a magazine.  Hook-and-loop shoulder pads combined with generous side strap belts allow for a large degree of adjustment, making the vest fit for any size.  <variant_olive>

A sturdy tactical vest, mostly mesh in the back and mostly solid nylon in the front.  It features three pockets for a rifle magazine, three pockets for a pistol magazine (or a tool of similar size), and an extra small pocket on the chest.  It comes with a pistol holster in the cross draw position: at an angle, on the side opposite the dominant hand, to be drawn with it; the holster has a separate pocket for a magazine.  Hook-and-loop shoulder pads combined with generous side strap belts allow for a large degree of adjustment, making the vest fit for any size.  This one has been custom-painted after the American flag.

notes: taken from the dimensions of the PBA concealable vest, since it appears to be similar-enough
thickness adjusted for the fact that this isn't a ballistic vest

description: A capable chest rig with pouches for rifle magazines and plenty of webbing.  Each side also features a flat pocket for things like maps.

description: A compact chest rig with three rifle magazine pouches and and a medium-sized general pouch.  Limited in capacity, but unencumbering.

variants.description: A compact chest rig.  At the back, a magazine insert can hold up to three STANAG magazines.  At the front, there's a general pouch that can be used to store field necessities in no particular order.  On the pouch, there's webbing for exterior pouches.  Due to its size, the rig is comfortable to wear even at full load.   <variant_multicam>

A compact chest rig.  At the back, a magazine insert can hold up to three STANAG magazines.  At the front, there's a large general pouch that can be used to store field necessities in no particular order.  On the pouch, there's webbing for exterior pouches.  Due to its size, the rig is comfortable to wear even at full load.  <variant_coyote>

A compact chest rig.  At the back, a magazine insert can hold up to three STANAG magazines.  At the front, there's a large general pouch that can be used to store field necessities in no particular order.  On the pouch, there's webbing for exterior pouches.  Due to its size, the rig is comfortable to wear even at full load.  <variant_olive>

A compact chest rig.  At the back, a magazine insert can hold up to three STANAG magazines.  At the front, there's a large general pouch that can be used to store field necessities in no particular order.  On the pouch, there's webbing for exterior pouches. description: A tiny chest rig with four rifle magazine pouches, four pistol magazine pouches, and two elastic cords for holding utility items.  Exceptionally-convenient, if not the most comfortable.

variants.description: An ultra-minimal, ultra-compact rig, intended to be worn concealed under an item of casual outerwear.  It features four rifle magazine pockets, four pistol magazine pockets, and two retention cords for larger, utility items.  The rifle pockets are stretchy enough to accomodate larger items, such as smoke grenades.  <variant_multicam>

An ultra-minimal, ultra-compact rig, intended to be worn concealed under an item of casual outerwear.  It features four rifle magazine pockets, four pistol magazine pockets, and two retention cords for larger, utility items.  The rifle pockets are stretchy enough to accomodate larger items, such as smoke grenades.  <variant_coyote>

An ultra-minimal, ultra-compact rig, intended to be worn concealed under an item of casual outerwear.  It features four rifle magazine pockets, four pistol magazine pockets, and two retention cords for larger, utility items.  The rifle pockets are stretchy enough to accomodate larger items, such as smoke grenades.  <variant_ranger>

The rifle pockets are stretchy enough to accomodate larger items, such as smoke grenades.  <variant_black>

//volume: we use the dimensions of `pouch_magazine_556_condor` as the basis for this item's volume calculations
we modify the length by 2 in. to account for the shorter pouches on the rig
we also use fabric thickness, not pouch overall depth, for height
we then multiply this by 8 to get the approximate overall volume of the rig

armor.//encumbrance: low encumbrance values to account for the fact that this rig has a FIT flag already

//notes: while this pocket is intended for rifle magazines, it's been shown to hold other, larger items, such as smoke grenades
thus, we model these pockets as though they're able to hold those
pocket_data.//max_contains_volume: volume of M18 smoke grenade, rounded to the nearest 50/100 ml
pocket_data.//min_item_length: arbitrary, to prevent smaller items from being stuck inside
pocket_data.//max_item_length: length of STANAG 30-round mag w/ ranger plate

pocket_data.//min_item_length: arbitrary, to prevent smaller items from being stuck inside
